interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Black Wolf - Men’s Gentle Hydrating Face Wash - 5 Fl Oz - Hydrating Sugar Technology Blend Helps Replenish Moisture - Natural Oils Argan, Coconut, & Safflower Hydrate Your Skin, Great for Dry Skin
Review Date: 2021/02/02
Store: Black Wolf
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Black Wolf', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '7.09 x 6.97 x 2.01 inches; 6.07 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BLKWLF_FACEWASH_DRY', 'UPC': '850021340070'}
Review Text: Great affordable men’s skincare line. Most of their line has activated charcoal which helps pull out all the goop (dirt and oil) from your skin. Leaving my hubbys face clean and clear. This wash suds up pretty good according to my hubby and he is very happy with the product!
Review Title: Great men’s skincare line
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Cutting Scissors Set 10 Pcs Professional Hairdressing Scissors Kit, Hair Cutting Scissors, Thinning Shears, Hair Razor Comb, Clips, Cape, Shears Kit for Home, Salon, Barber P.travel {'Brand': 'P.travel', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '11.2 x 5.5 x 1.5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'UPC': '740646020214', 'Manufacturer': 'P.travel'} [[VIDEOID:e63684315904fe3d7cd3092a12671e7d]] This is a great kit for my household. We do touch ups in between our appointments. The cape is thin and has small ties in the back but works perfect for both my husband and I. The scissors are a little bigger so for my smaller hands I could use a little bit smaller pair but it does the trick. I also have used the cape when I dye my roots and it works great to keep me protected. Perfect kit for my touch ups Revitalizing N.M.F Intensive Hydrating Serum that treats Dull, Tired, Dry and Sensitive Skin from Manilla Natural Skincare Manilla Natural Skincare {'Skin Type': 'mature', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydration', 'Brand': 'Manilla Natural Skincare', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Hydrating,Wrinkles', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.38 x 1.38 x 3.54 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} I am a lover of high quality face serums because they soak into your skin without leaving you greasy like oils or lotions but unfortunately not all serums Are created equal. Some are packed with cheap oils and don’t truly work, well Not this one!!! This one is everything! I put it on all over my face, neck and especially under my eyes (which is my trouble spot because of little wrinkles) and this soaks in so beautiful. It hydrated that area so my makeup goes on like butter! It is a very light fresh smell- I almost don’t smell anything- which is perfect because my eyes can water so easy but not with this serum!
It’s vegan friendly too!
Manila serum is a must have in my morning routine. Obsessed with this serum Hylunia Hydrate Body Wash - Energizing Blend With Mango 8.5 oz Hylunia {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'Item model number': '059ENM-250-R', 'UPC': '185449000313'} This lathers up so nice and is beyond moisturizing to my skin. My skin felt fresh and so hydrated! The mango body wash smells so good that my husband even commented how yummy I smell. Obsessed with this mango body wash Aibilye Shower Cap, 3Pcs Shower Cap For Women,Shower Cap For Kids, Double Waterproof,Hair Care Cap,Salon Shower Cap,Reusable, Medium Size(STYLE-1) Aibilye {'Brand': 'Aibilye', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Pattern': 'Floral', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Size': 'Medium', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 8.5 x 0.3 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} What amazing quality for this price! These are also reusable and I love these so much better than the cheap plastic ones!
Works great to keep my hair dry in the shower- I try not to wash my hair daily!
So happy with these!!! Awesome product for the price Black Wolf - Men’s Gentle Hydrating Face Wash - 5 Fl Oz - Hydrating Sugar Technology Blend Helps Replenish Moisture - Natural Oils Argan, Coconut, & Safflower Hydrate Your Skin, Great for Dry Skin Black Wolf {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Black Wolf', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '7.09 x 6.97 x 2.01 inches; 6.07 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BLKWLF_FACEWASH_DRY', 'UPC': '850021340070'} Great affordable men’s skincare line. Most of their line has activated charcoal which helps pull out all the goop (dirt and oil) from your skin. Leaving my hubbys face clean and clear. This wash suds up pretty good according to my hubby and he is very happy with the product! Great men’s skincare line
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus:** The user is dedicated to personal grooming, emphasizing effective hair cutting and styling tools for home use. Their acquisition of reusable shower caps highlights their commitment to maintaining hair health during showers.

- **Skincare Interest:** Their skincare interests have expanded to include facial and body care, particularly favoring hydrating formulations that provide a luxurious sensory experience. They prioritize moisturizing products throughout their routines.

- **Product Preference:** The user values comprehensive kits and effective solutions, seeking items that yield noticeable benefits over superficial ones. Their satisfaction with quality brands reflects a preference for functional, practical products.

- **Practicality:** They maintain a practical mindset, appreciating ergonomic and versatile solutions for hair and skincare, emphasizing ease of use and user-friendly designs.

- **Multi-Use Capability:** They favor multi-functional items, effectively utilizing hydrating products across different body areas to enhance their overall care routine.

- **Overall Experience:** With consistent positive interactions with reputable brands known for effective, quality products, including vegan-friendly options, the user demonstrates a detail-oriented approach to personal care. Their recent engagement with a men’s skincare line indicates an inclination towards products that cater to diverse skincare needs, underscoring their appreciation for effective, affordable solutions. This further reinforces their commitment to maintaining high personal care standards.
